image.altText: An older couple with their heads close together, smiling at the camera.

props.synopsis: Robert Hall was killed when he was struck by partially blind driver John Charles Robertson on the Horrocks Highway in 2018. It has been a long wait for the family ahead of the release of coronial findings into his death next month.Â

title.children: Family's anger at seven-year coronial inquest wait

image.altText: An SA police vehicle

image.altText: Optus sign in front of a building

props.synopsis: The Singapore government's sovereign wealth investment vehicle is majority-owned by Singtel, which owns Australia's second-largest telco provider.

image.altText: A building with grey, green and brown colouring and the words 'Edge Early Learning'

image.altText: Mohammad Shareed Hotak - man with dark hair in green shirt

image.altText: Murray Watt presser

image.altText: Bright yellow canola flowers in a paddock fill the frame.

image.altText: Macquarie sign at top of building.

props.synopsis: Corporate regulator ASIC reaches a deal with Macquarie to fully compensate investors in the collapsed super fund Shield. Meanwhile, major share indices are easing on worries that interest rates will not fall much further. image.altText: Ted Cruz wearing a blue suit speaking at a press conference in front of microphones.

image.altText: Two Chinese flags flutter in the wind at a shipping port.
